title: General
content:
General

State Regulations
§ 1261.1 - Careless, negligent or drunken operation of aircraft prohibited
§ 1261.2 - Compliance with orders, signals and directives of Port Authority representatives required
§ 1261.3 - Aircraft subject to detainment for nonpayment of charges
§ 1261.4 - Right reserved to deny use of terminal for violation of rules and regulations
§ 1261.5 - Operator required to report any accident causing injury or damage
§ 1261.6 - Wrecked or disabled aircraft to be promptly removed
§ 1261.7 - Aircraft to clear active runways during emergency
§ 1261.8 - Interference, tampering or unauthorized starting of aircraft prohibited
§ 1261.9 - Enplaning or deplaning passengers restricted
§ 1261.10 - Loading and unloading of aircraft restricted
§ 1261.11 - Cleaning and maintenance of aircraft restricted to designated areas
§ 1261.12 - Permission required for aircraft to cross highways under own power or in tow
§ 1261.13 - Responsibility for removal of spilled substances
§ 1261.14 - Heating of engines to be by approved means only
§ 1261.15 - Permission to use gate position required

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
